events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund. The product is not what I paid for and I need assistance with returning it.
Based on the customer's message about receiving the wrong product and requesting money back, the issue is categorized under Refund for further processing.
The case has been assigned to our refund support specialist to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and want to get a refund. I'm here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the issue and start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the item I received which is different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the information and photo. We will initiate a full refund for your order and provide you instructions on how to return the incorrect item at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will follow the return process as you outlined.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We just wanted to check in and ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since you confirmed the refund was received and you have no further questions, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
